member.name: POWER_PLATFORM_ROLE
member.summary: Indicates the OEM's preferred power management profile. These values are read from the Preferred_PM_Profile field of the Fixed ACPI Description Table (FADT). These values are returned by the or function.

member.name: POWER_PLATFORM_ROLE.PlatformRoleUnspecified
member.summary: The OEM did not specify a specific role.

member.name: POWER_PLATFORM_ROLE.PlatformRoleDesktop
member.summary: The OEM specified a desktop role.

member.name: POWER_PLATFORM_ROLE.PlatformRoleMobile
member.summary: The OEM specified a mobile role (for example, a laptop).

member.name: POWER_PLATFORM_ROLE.PlatformRoleWorkstation
member.summary: The OEM specified a workstation role.

member.name: POWER_PLATFORM_ROLE.PlatformRoleEnterpriseServer

member.name: POWER_PLATFORM_ROLE.PlatformRoleSOHOServer

member.name: POWER_PLATFORM_ROLE.PlatformRoleAppliancePC

member.name: POWER_PLATFORM_ROLE.PlatformRolePerformanceServer

summary.para: The OEM specified a tablet form factor role.

Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Vista or Windows Server 2008: In version 1 of this enumeration, this value is equivalent to PlatformRoleMaximum. This value is supported in version 2 of this enumeration starting with Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012.

member.name: POWER_PLATFORM_ROLE.PlatformRoleMaximum
